# Documentation Templates

This directory contains standardized templates for common documentation types used in the Ghost Protocol project.

## Available Templates

| Template | Purpose | When to Use |
|----------|---------|-------------|
| [Technical Design Document](technical-design-document.md) | Detailed technical specifications for new features | Before implementing major features or architectural changes |
| [Bug Report](bug-report.md) | Standardized bug reporting format | When reporting bugs via GitHub Issues |
| [Feature Request](feature-request.md) | Structured feature proposal format | When proposing new features or enhancements |
| [Onboarding Checklist](onboarding-checklist.md) | New developer setup guide | For onboarding new team members |
| [Release Notes](release-notes.md) | Version release documentation | Before each production release |

## How to Use Templates

1. **Copy the template** to the appropriate location
2. **Fill in all sections** marked with `[FILL IN]`
3. **Remove unused optional sections** (marked with `(Optional)`)
4. **Follow the guidelines** in each section
5. **Request review** from document owner

## Template Customization

Templates are designed to be flexible:
- **Required sections** must be completed
- **Optional sections** can be removed if not applicable
- **Add custom sections** if needed for your specific use case
- **Maintain consistency** with the overall structure

## Questions?

- For template improvements: Create issue with label `documentation`
- For usage questions: Ask in team chat or consult [DOCUMENTATION-OWNERSHIP.md](../DOCUMENTATION-OWNERSHIP.md)
